alert.note: Alert for Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 6:50PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Huerfano and northeastern Costilla Counties through 815 PM MDT... At 646 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Spring Burn Scar south of Highway 160 in Costilla county, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Enhanced streamflows over the central and western Spring Burn Scar. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Higher streamflows are expected over Wagon Creek, Middle Creek, and Pass Creek. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Spring Burn Scar north of Highway 160 around 650 PM MDT. La Veta Pass around 655 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft
